org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class opencv_imgproc.BaseColumnFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_imgproc.BaseColumnFilter
  • Enclosing class:
    opencv_imgproc

    public static class opencv_imgproc.BaseColumnFilter
extends Pointer
    The Base Class for Column-wise Filters This is the base class for linear or non-linear filters that process columns of 2D arrays. Such filters are used for the "vertical" filtering parts in separable filters. Several functions in OpenCV return Ptr for the specific types of filters, and those pointers can be used directly or within cv::FilterEngine. Unlike cv::BaseRowFilter, cv::BaseColumnFilter may have some context information, i.e. box filter keeps the sliding sum of elements. To reset the state BaseColumnFilter::reset() must be called (e.g. the method is called by cv::FilterEngine)
